# TCButton

**Class**

A control that represents a single on-screen button.

## Declaration

```swift
class TCButton
```

## Overview

This is mirrored by a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/GameController/GCControllerButtonInput] on the associated [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/GameController/GCController].

## Inspecting a button

- **contents**: The contents for the button in its normal state.
- **highlightDuration**: The time it takes for a highlight to fade away, in seconds.

## Getting the collider shape

- **colliderShape**: The collider shape for the button.
- **TCColliderShape**: Defines the shape of a control collider.

## Controls

- **TCControl**: A protocol that defines the base properties and methods for all touch controls.
- **TCDirectionPad**: An object that represents a direction pad.
- **TCSwitch**: A control that represents a single on-screen switch.
- **TCThumbstick**: Represents a single on-screen thumbstick.
- **TCThrottle**: Represents a single on-screen throttle - a one axis input.
- **TCTouchpad**: Represents a single on-screen touchpad that reports absolute coordinates or delta movements.
